text: mzsh command line tool commands that are available even when the Platform is not running, vary both in argument requirements and in behavior, depending on the logged on user's user permissions. This section includes a detailed description of each command, its required or optional arguments, and its operation. The following commands are available: encryptpassword exit help kill pcommit pcreate picoversion quit restart shutdown startup status system topo version For information about the commands that or only available when the Platform is running, see Available When the Platform Is Running .
title: Always Available - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
